## City tour of Regensburg

You are welcome to take part in a **free guided tour** of Regensburg historical town centre, either before or after the workshop. Participation on the tour is subject to signing up in advance.

There will be two options for the tour:

<ul>

<li>**Tuesday 25th February** from 17.30 - 19.00
</li>

<li>**Friday 28th February** from 9.00 - 10.30
</li>

</ul>

Further details and sign up will be announced to participants shortly.

<br>

## Workshop dinner

There will be a workshop dinner on **Wednesday 26th February** at 19.00. Payment is the responsibility of the participant.

The venue and sign up details will be announced to participants shortly.
